data.text:
@entreresource @ace_7410 I am talking more about citizens. Not higher-ups. Rep or Dem, they should both know we are screwing ourselves.
You don't shoot your own dick to punish other places. That is dumb logic. And that is where we are.
@ace_7410 @urmaker69 Exactly. All politicians except maybe Lyndsey Graham have been silent on it (which for now is the right move).
@urmaker69 I’ve honestly not seen anyone say they want us to get involved in a serious manner. On either side.

@urmaker69 Yup. My province is finally lifting all regulations on the 21st and so many are going off about how the Conservative government wants to kill us and cares more about money than keeping us safe 🤦‍♀️ Even tho the goal of getting the vaccines out was to be able to lift restrictions.
@Falcons__Hawks I am sure I am shadow-banned in some way for some of the stuff I say. :P
@urmaker69 Careful there you might be having an illegal thought wouldn't want to get censored by twitter would you? 🤣

@ace_7410 I agree we should find alternatives, but we need better tech. We don't even have the batteries to hold all the energy if we can even create enough. Let alone replace them over time. Even solar panel production has issues. From temp changes (blocking the ground) to killing birds.

@urmaker69 Absolutely. We definitely should’ve relied more off of our own oil. But I’m also a person of finding alternatives to fuel. I think we should’ve relied on our own supply till we find a way to go more solar options, or electronically.
@ace_7410 We aren't properly prepared for the situation we are in. We should be in a spot where cutting them off wouldn't affect us at all/minimally.

@ace_7410 Yeah, but would have been better if rather than hate Trump, we listened and did some of the stuff he said. Like when he bitched about our NATO allies buying so much oil from Russia that they would be screwed if this happened. Down to us producing more of our own.
